content.2: Son of man, cause Jerusalem to know her abominations,
content.3: And say, Thus saith the Lord
content.5: None eye pitied thee, to do any of these unto thee, to have compassion upon thee; but thou wast cast out in the open field, to the lothing of thy person, in the day that thou wast born.
content.6: And when I passed by thee, and saw thee polluted in thine own blood, I said unto thee
content.7: I have caused thee to multiply as the bud of the field, and thou hast increased and waxen great, and thou art come to excellent ornaments:
content.8: Now when I passed by thee, and looked upon thee, behold, thy time
content.9: Then washed I thee with water; yea, I throughly washed away thy blood from thee, and I anointed thee with oil.
content.10: I clothed thee also with broidered work, and shod thee with badgers’ skin, and I girded thee about with fine linen, and I covered thee with silk.
content.11: I decked thee also with ornaments, and I put bracelets upon thy hands, and a chain on thy neck.
content.12: And I put a jewel on thy forehead, and earrings in thine ears, and a beautiful crown upon thine head.
content.13: Thus wast thou decked with gold and silver; and thy raiment
content.14: And thy renown went forth among the heathen for thy beauty: for it
content.15: But thou didst trust in thine own beauty, and playedst the harlot because of thy renown, and pouredst out thy fornications on every one that passed by; his it was.
content.16: And of thy garments thou didst take, and deckedst thy high places with divers colours, and playedst the harlot thereupon:
content.17: Thou hast also taken thy fair jewels of my gold and of my silver, which I had given thee, and madest to thyself images of men, and didst commit whoredom with them,
content.18: And tookest thy broidered garments, and coveredst them: and thou hast set mine oil and mine incense before them.
content.19: My meat also which I gave thee, fine flour, and oil, and honey,
content.20: Moreover thou hast taken thy sons and thy daughters, whom thou hast borne unto me, and these hast thou sacrificed unto them to be devoured.
content.21: That thou hast slain my children, and delivered them to cause them to pass through
content.22: And in all thine abominations and thy whoredoms thou hast not remembered the days of thy youth, when thou wast naked and bare,
content.23: And it came to pass after all thy wickedness, (woe, woe unto thee! saith the Lord
content.25: Thou hast built thy high place at every head of the way, and hast made thy beauty to be abhorred, and hast opened thy feet to every one that passed by, and multiplied thy whoredoms.
content.26: Thou hast also committed fornication with the Egyptians thy neighbours, great of flesh; and hast increased thy whoredoms, to provoke me to anger.
content.27: Behold, therefore I have stretched out my hand over thee, and have diminished thine ordinary
content.28: Thou hast played the whore also with the Assyrians, because thou wast unsatiable; yea, thou hast played the harlot with them, and yet couldest not be satisfied.
content.29: Thou hast moreover multiplied thy fornication in the land of Canaan unto Chaldea; and yet thou wast not satisfied herewith.
content.30: How weak is thine heart, saith the Lord
content.31: In that thou buildest thine eminent place in the head of every way, and makest thine high place in every street; and hast not been as an harlot, in that thou scornest hire;
content.33: They give gifts to all whores: but thou givest thy gifts to all thy lovers, and hirest them, that they may come unto thee on every side for thy whoredom.

content.35: Wherefore, O harlot, hear the word of the
content.37: Behold, therefore I will gather all thy lovers, with whom thou hast taken pleasure, and all
content.38: And I will judge thee, as women that break wedlock and shed blood are judged; and I will give thee blood in fury and jealousy.
content.39: And I will also give thee into their hand, and they shall throw down thine eminent place, and shall break down thy high places: they shall strip thee also of thy clothes, and shall take thy fair jewels, and leave thee naked and bare.
content.40: They shall also bring up a company against thee, and they shall stone thee with stones, and thrust thee through with their swords.
content.41: And they shall burn thine houses with fire, and execute judgments upon thee in the sight of many women: and I will cause thee to cease from playing the harlot, and thou also shalt give no hire any more.
content.42: So will I make my fury toward thee to rest, and my jealousy shall depart from thee, and I will be quiet, and will be no more angry.
content.43: Because thou hast not remembered the days of thy youth, but hast fretted me in all these
content.44: Behold, every one that useth proverbs shall use
content.47: Yet hast thou not walked after their ways, nor done after their abominations: but, as
content.49: Behold, this was the iniquity of thy sister Sodom, pride, fulness of bread, and abundance of idleness was in her and in her daughters, neither did she strengthen the hand of the poor and needy.
content.50: And they were haughty, and committed abomination before me: therefore I took them away as I saw
content.51: Neither hath Samaria committed half of thy sins; but thou hast multiplied thine abominations more than they, and hast justified thy sisters in all thine abominations which thou hast done.
content.52: Thou also, which hast judged thy sisters, bear thine own shame for thy sins that thou hast committed more abominable than they: they are more righteous than thou: yea, be thou confounded also, and bear thy shame, in that thou hast justified thy sisters.
content.53: When I shall bring again their captivity, the captivity of Sodom and her daughters, and the captivity of Samaria and her daughters, then
content.54: That thou mayest bear thine own shame, and mayest be confounded in all that thou hast done, in that thou art a comfort unto them.
content.55: When thy sisters, Sodom and her daughters, shall return to their former estate, and Samaria and her daughters shall return to their former estate, then thou and thy daughters shall return to your former estate.
content.56: For thy sister Sodom was not mentioned by thy mouth in the day of thy pride,
content.57: Before thy wickedness was discovered, as at the time of
content.58: Thou hast borne thy lewdness and thine abominations, saith the
content.60: Nevertheless I will remember my covenant with thee in the days of thy youth, and I will establish unto thee an everlasting covenant.
content.61: Then thou shalt remember thy ways, and be ashamed, when thou shalt receive thy sisters, thine elder and thy younger: and I will give them unto thee for daughters, but not by thy covenant.
content.62: And I will establish my covenant with thee; and thou shalt know that I
content.63: That thou mayest remember, and be confounded, and never open thy mouth any more because of thy shame, when I am pacified toward thee for all that thou hast done, saith the Lord
